title: Relates to the regulation of cadmium-added novelty consumer products
summary: Relates to the regulation of cadmium-added novelty consumer products.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2729

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                   January 31, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by Sens. FUSCHILLO, HANNON, LARKIN -- read twice and ordered
         printed, and when printed to be committed to the Committee on Environ-
         mental Conservation

       AN ACT to amend the  environmental  conservation  law,  in  relation  to
         cadmium-added novelty consumer products

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Article 27 of the environmental conservation law is amended
    2  by adding a new title 2 to read as follows:
    3                                    TITLE 2
    4                   CADMIUM-ADDED NOVELTY CONSUMER PRODUCTS
    5  SECTION 27-0201. CADMIUM-ADDED NOVELTY CONSUMER PRODUCTS.
    6  S 27-0201. CADMIUM-ADDED NOVELTY CONSUMER PRODUCTS.
    7    1. "CADMIUM-ADDED NOVELTY CONSUMER PRODUCT" MEANS A  PRODUCT  INTENDED
    8  MAINLY  FOR PERSONAL USE OR ADORNMENT THAT CONTAINS CADMIUM IN AN AMOUNT
    9  EQUAL TO OR IN EXCESS OF .0075 PER CENT BY WEIGHT.  CADMIUM-ADDED NOVEL-
   10  TY CONSUMER PRODUCTS INCLUDE BUT ARE NOT LIMITED TO  JEWELRY,  TOYS  AND
   11  ORNAMENTS.
   12    2.  ON AND AFTER JUNE 1, 2013, NO PERSON SHALL SELL, OFFER FOR SALE OR
   13  DISTRIBUTE FREE OF CHARGE IN THE STATE ANY CADMIUM-ADDED NOVELTY CONSUM-
   14  ER PRODUCT. A MANUFACTURER THAT PRODUCES  OR  THAT  SELLS  CADMIUM-ADDED
   15  NOVELTY CONSUMER PRODUCTS SHALL NOTIFY RETAILERS THAT SELL SUCH PRODUCTS
   16  ABOUT  THE PRODUCT BAN AND INFORM SUCH RETAILERS HOW TO PROPERLY DISPOSE
   17  OF THE REMAINING INVENTORY.
   18    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.



        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02955-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to cadmium-added novelty consumer products
